channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Caroline Hawley is in Hemswell, Lincolnshire, with the reds and the blues, led by experts Izzie Balmer and Mark Stacey. Both teams are eager to make a profit at the auction. Meanwhile, Caroline visits a local man who is upcycling antique objects and turning them into innovative lamps.
